amendment.description: Amendment sought to add a factual findings section addressing the macroeconomic impact of the tax cuts of 2001 and 2003.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 112-383 to add a findings section addressing the macroeconomic impact of the tax cuts of 2001 and 2003.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 244 (Roll no. 24).
